entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount possibly more than 15 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
